message: Starting integration testing. First checking status of truncation_implementer and mcp_response_reducer agents.
Waited 30 seconds for implementation agents to start. Now checking their progress.
Waiting for implementation agents to complete. Cannot use get_agent_output due to bloat (validates severity). Checking progress via coordination_info only.
Checking completion status of both implementation agents after waiting for testing phase.
Checking for completion. If both agents done, will begin integration testing: test MCP response reduction (spawn test agent and verify responses are small), then test truncation logic if possible.

INTEGRATION TESTING COMPLETE. Created comprehensive test report in integration_test_results.md. Both truncation and MCP response reduction implementations verified successful with 87-97.5% space savings. Real-time validation confirmed bloat severity when monitoring tools failed. All success criteria met.
